title: Research
textUnderTitle: Researchers at the Faculty of Science study a number of fundamental questions in mathematics, physics, chemistry, computer science, geography and geosciences. Their approach is multidisciplinary. Our internationally recognised research focuses on four areas: Global change â€“ from observations to understanding and action, Solutions for sustainable development, From complex data to insight, and AI.
coloredBgCardText: We actively cooperate across disciplinary and institutional boundaries. Cooperation makes our research increasingly impactful.
